pages.text:
A form of divination, tarot has long been seeped in mystery, being used by many to help reveal the obscure. Indeed, in the hands of a skilled witch the tarot may illuminate every facet of a player's life.
Tarot cards may be created by infusing paper using the $(thing)$(t:See book of magic)Ritual of Engraving.$()

To get a reading about yourself, you must Shift + Right Click with the cards in your hand.
To uncover secrets about another player simply right click them while holding the cards. Then by placing the cards upon a Divination Table a witch will gain some insight into the unknown.

Note that this knowledge comes at a cost, $(l:magic_power/magical_energy)power$() that needs to be drawn from a nearby source.
